mcp-sequentialthinking-tools.description: Dynamic and reflective problem-solving through structured thought sequences
capabilities: Step-by-step thinking process for complex problems
Dynamic thought sequences that can branch and revise
Reflective problem-solving that examines its own reasoning
Structured analysis with explicit reasoning chains

when_to_use: Planning your analytical approach before diving in
Breaking down complex coding decisions step-by-step
Working through theoretical tensions and integration challenges
Analyzing dimensional variations in pattern characterization
Building final theoretical frameworks in Stage 3

stage_recommendations.stage1: Planning manual analysis approach, thinking through sampling
stage_recommendations.stage2_phase1: Deep analysis of theoretical patterns from literature
stage_recommendations.stage2_phase2: Working through synthesis challenges and integration

lotus-wisdom.description: Multi-faceted problem-solving using the Lotus Sutra's wisdom framework - integrates analytical thinking with intuitive wisdom
capabilities: Five wisdom domains: Skillful Means, Non-Dual Recognition, Meta-Cognitive, Process Flow, Meditation
Direct and gradual approaches to truth
Meditation pauses to let insights emerge naturally
Beautiful visualizations with colors and symbols
Integration of apparent contradictions into higher understanding

when_to_use: Theoretical and empirical streams seem irreconcilable
Pattern characterizations appear contradictory
Stuck in either/or thinking that feels limiting
Need to move from tension to integration
Breaking out of analytical local maxima
Questions benefiting from both direct and gradual approaches

stage_recommendations.stage2_phase2: Navigating tensions between theoretical and empirical patterns
stage_recommendations.stage2_phase3: When patterns overlap in confusing ways
stage_recommendations.stage3: Integrating diverse findings into coherent theory

zen-mcp-server.description: Multi-model validation and triangulation - prevents single-AI bias

when_to_use: Validating major analytical decisions across multiple AI perspectives
Checking interpretations for single-model bias
Getting alternative viewpoints on ambiguous coding
Synthesis validation from different model strengths
Quality check for final theoretical claims

stage_recommendations.stage2_phase2: Validate synthesis across Claude, Gemini, GPT-4

usage_guide.commands: /qual-get-perspectives (sends question to multiple models for triangulation)

jina-ai-mcp-server.description: Fetch articles and webpages in markdown - critical for theoretical stream

when_to_use: Importing foundational articles for Phase 1 Stream A
Fetching theoretical frameworks and literature
Converting online resources to analyzable format

stage_recommendations.stage2_phase1: Primary use - fetch literature for theoretical pattern extraction

usage_guide.note: Works with Exa for search + fetch workflow

exa.description: Search academic literature and code contexts extensively

when_to_use: Literature search for theoretical foundations
Finding relevant papers for Stream A analysis
Discovering theoretical frameworks related to your phenomena

stage_recommendations.stage2_phase1: Search literature before theoretical pattern extraction

markdownify.description: Convert almost anything to markdown - PDFs, web pages, audio (with transcription!), videos, Office docs, and images

capabilities: pdf-to-markdown: Convert PDF files (articles, reports, documents)
audio-to-markdown: Transcribe audio files to text (great for interview recordings!)
youtube-to-markdown: Extract content from YouTube videos
webpage-to-markdown: Convert web pages and articles
image-to-markdown: Convert images with metadata extraction
when_to_use: Converting PDF articles to analyzable markdown
Transcribing audio interview recordings to text
Importing research documents from various formats
Fetching and converting web-based literature
Processing PowerPoint presentations as data sources
Converting spreadsheet data for analysis

stage_recommendations.stage1: Convert audio interviews to text, import PDF documents
stage_recommendations.stage2_phase1: Convert foundational articles, YouTube lectures, web resources

usage_guide.note: Especially valuable for researchers with audio-recorded interviews - can transcribe directly!

when_to_use: Managing theoretical literature for Stream A
Tracking citations for manuscript writing
Organizing foundational articles

stage_recommendations.stage2_phase1: Manage literature for theoretical pattern extraction

usage_philosophy.principle: MCPs are epistemic tools, not just utilities

guidance.sequential_thinking: For when you need to think deeply, not quickly
guidance.lotus_wisdom: For when apparent contradictions need transcending
guidance.markdownify: For converting PDFs and documents to analyzable format
guidance.zen_mcp: For when single perspective feels limited (optional)

mcp_activation_strategy.rationale: Bundled MCPs auto-start with plugin (no API keys needed). Optional MCPs require user configuration.

custom_mcps_to_build: data-management-server (Python) - for any textual/multimodal qualitative data
for_future_versions.integration_vision: All MCPs communicate through conversation-log.jsonl for full transparency

bundled_mcps.description: These MCPs auto-start with the plugin - no configuration needed!
servers: markdownify - Convert anything to markdown (PDFs, audio, videos, web pages, Office docs)

optional_mcps.description: These MCPs require API keys - configure only if you need them

installation_notes.getting_started: Just install the plugin and run /qual-init. All bundled MCPs work immediately!
